compound.name: DecagonES2
compound.brief: The Sensor sub-class for the Decagon ES-2 sensor.

base_classes.name: SDI12Sensors
base_classes.brief: The main class for SDI-12 Sensors.

typeless_funcs.name: DecagonES2
typeless_funcs.brief: Construct a new Decagon ES2 object.
typeless_funcs.description:
The SDI-12 address of the sensor, the Arduino pin controlling power on/off, and the Arduino pin sending and receiving data are required for the sensor constructor. Optionally, you can include a number of distinct readings to average. The data pin must be a pin that supports pin-change interrupts.

Warning

The SDI-12 address must be changed from the factory programmed value of "0" before the ES-2 can be used with ModularSensors!

params.name: SDI12address
params.description: The SDI-12 address of the ES-2; can be a char, char*, or int.

params.name: powerPin
params.description:
The pin on the mcu controlling power to the ES2 Use -1 if it is continuously powered.

  • The ES2 requires a 3.5-12V power supply, which can be turned off between measurements

params.name: dataPin
params.description: The pin on the mcu connected to the data line of the SDI-12 circuit.

params.name: measurementsToAverage
params.description: The number of measurements to take and average before giving a "final" result from the sensor; optional with a default value of 1.
